                  DispAP PROC

;;;504    static void DispAP(void)
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;505    {
000004  b090              SUB      sp,sp,#0x40
;;;506    	char buf[48];

;;;508    	uint16_t x, y;	
;;;509    
;;;510    	/* 设置字体参数 */
;;;511    	{
;;;512    		tFont.FontCode = FC_ST_16;	/* 字体代码 16点阵 */

000008  f88d0034          STRB     r0,[sp,#0x34]
;;;513    		tFont.FrontColor = CL_GREY;	/* 字体颜色 */

;;;514    		tFont.BackColor = CL_BTN_FACE;		/* 文字背景颜色 */

;;;515    		tFont.Space = 0;				/* 文字间距，单位 = 像素 */
00001c  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00001e  f8ad103a          STRH     r1,[sp,#0x3a]
;;;516    	}
;;;517    	
;;;518    	x = 10;
000022  f04f080a          MOV      r8,#0xa
;;;519    	y = 25;

;;;520    	
;;;521    	
;;;522    	LCD_Fill_Rect(x, y, 234, 280, CL_BTN_FACE);

;;;523    	
;;;524    	sprintf(buf, "共扫描到%d个WiFi AP", g_APCount);

;;;525    	DispInfoWiFi(buf);

000048  f7fffffe          BL       DispInfoWiFi
;;;526    	
;;;527    	{
;;;528    		uint8_t i;
;;;529    		uint8_t m;
;;;530    		//const char *ecn_name[5] = 
;;;531    		//{
;;;532    		//	"OPEN", "WEP", "WPA_PSK", "WPA2_PSK", "WPA_WPA2_PSK"
;;;533    		//};
;;;534    		m = g_APCount;

;;;536    		{
;;;537    			m = 13;

;;;538    		}
;;;539    		for (i = 0; i < m; i++)

000058  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
00005a  e016              B        |L2.138|

;;;540    		{			
;;;541    			//sprintf(buf, "  %02d=%s, rssi=%d, [%s]\r\n", i+1, g_APList[i].ssid, g_APList[i].rssi,

;;;544    			sprintf(buf, "%02d=%s, %ddBm", i+1, FormWIFI->APList[i].ssid, FormWIFI->APList[i].rssi);

;;;546    			LCD_DispStr(x , y, buf, &tFont);

;;;548    		}
;;;549    	}	
;;;550    }

000090  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;551    
                          ENDP

                  |L2.148|
                          DCD      ||.data||
                  |L2.152|
000098  b9b2c9a8          DCB      185,178,201,168,195,232,181,189,"%d",184,246,"WiFi AP",0
00009c  c3e8b5bd
0000a0  2564b8f6
0000a4  57694669
0000a8  20415000
                  |L2.172|
0000ac  25303264          DCB      "%02d=%s, %ddBm",0
0000b0  3d25732c
0000b4  20256464
0000b8  426d00  
0000bb  00                DCB      0

                          AREA ||i.DispFormWIFI||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  DispFormWIFI PROC
;;;684    */
;;;685    static void DispFormWIFI(void)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;686    {
;;;687    	//LCD_ClrScr(CL_BTN_FACE);
;;;688    
;;;689    	/* 分组框 */
;;;690    	LCD_DrawGroupBox(&FormWIFI->Box1);
000002  4c18              LDR      r4,|L3.100|
000004  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]  ; FormWIFI
000006  3028              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x28
000008  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawGroupBox
;;;691    
;;;692    	/* 标签 */
;;;693    	LCD_DrawLabel(&FormWIFI->Label1);
00000c  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]  ; FormWIFI
00000e  303c              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x3c
000010  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawLabel
;;;694    	LCD_DrawLabel(&FormWIFI->Label2);
000014  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]  ; FormWIFI
000016  3050              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x50
000018  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawLabel
;;;695    
;;;696    	/* 按钮 */
;;;697    	LCD_DrawButton(&FormWIFI->BtnRet);
00001c  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]  ; FormWIFI
00001e  f50070c2          ADD      r0,r0,#0x184
000022  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;698    	LCD_DrawButton(&FormWIFI->Btn1);
000026  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]  ; FormWIFI
000028  f5007092          ADD      r0,r0,#0x124
00002c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;699    	LCD_DrawButton(&FormWIFI->Btn2);
000030  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]  ; FormWIFI
000032  f500709e          ADD      r0,r0,#0x13c
000036  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;700    	LCD_DrawButton(&FormWIFI->Btn3);
00003a  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]  ; FormWIFI
00003c  f50070aa          ADD      r0,r0,#0x154
000040  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;701    	LCD_DrawButton(&FormWIFI->Btn4);	
000044  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]  ; FormWIFI
000046  f50070b6          ADD      r0,r0,#0x16c
00004a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;702    
;;;703    	/* 编辑框 */
;;;704    	LCD_DrawEdit(&FormWIFI->Edit1);
00004e  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]  ; FormWIFI
000050  30f0              ADDS     r0,r0,#0xf0
000052  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawEdit
;;;705    
;;;706    	/* 动态标签 */
;;;707    	LCD_DrawLabel(&FormWIFI->Label2);
000056  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]  ; FormWIFI
000058  e8bd4010          POP      {r4,lr}
00005c  3050              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x50
00005e  f7ffbffe          B.W      LCD_DrawLabel
;;;708    }
;;;709    
                          ENDP

000062  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L3.100|
                          DCD      ||.data||

                          AREA ||i.DispInfoWiFi||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  DispInfoWiFi PROC
;;;670    */
;;;671    static void DispInfoWiFi(char *_str)
000000  4903              LDR      r1,|L4.16|
;;;672    {
;;;673    	FormWIFI->Label1.pCaption = _str;
000002  6849              LDR      r1,[r1,#4]  ; FormWIFI
;;;674    	LCD_DrawLabel(&FormWIFI->Label1);
000004  64c8              STR      r0,[r1,#0x4c]
000006  f101003c          ADD      r0,r1,#0x3c
00000a  f7ffbffe          B.W      LCD_DrawLabel
;;;675    }
;;;676    
                          ENDP

00000e  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L4.16|
                          DCD      ||.data||

                          AREA ||i.InitFormWIFI||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  InitFormWIFI PROC
;;;559    */
;;;560    static void InitFormWIFI(void)
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;561    {
;;;562    	/* 分组框标题字体 */
;;;563    	FormWIFI->FontBox.FontCode = FC_ST_16;
000004  4c58              LDR      r4,|L5.360|
000006  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
;;;564    	FormWIFI->FontBox.BackColor = CL_BTN_FACE;	/* 和背景色相同 */
000008  f64e735b          MOV      r3,#0xef5b
00000c  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]            ;563  ; FormWIFI
;;;565    	FormWIFI->FontBox.FrontColor = CL_BLACK;
00000e  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
;;;566    	FormWIFI->FontBox.Space = 0;
;;;567    
;;;568    	/* 字体1 用于静止标签 */
;;;569    	FormWIFI->FontBlack.FontCode = FC_ST_16;
;;;570    	FormWIFI->FontBlack.BackColor = CL_BTN_FACE;		/* 透明色 */
;;;571    	FormWIFI->FontBlack.FrontColor = CL_BLACK;
;;;572    	FormWIFI->FontBlack.Space = 0;
;;;573    
;;;574    	/* 字体2 用于变化的文字 */
;;;575    	FormWIFI->FontBlue.FontCode = FC_ST_16;
;;;576    	FormWIFI->FontBlue.BackColor = CL_BTN_FACE;
;;;577    	FormWIFI->FontBlue.FrontColor = CL_BLUE;
000010  251f              MOVS     r5,#0x1f
000012  f8801020          STRB     r1,[r0,#0x20]         ;563
000016  8483              STRH     r3,[r0,#0x24]         ;564
000018  8442              STRH     r2,[r0,#0x22]         ;565
00001a  84c2              STRH     r2,[r0,#0x26]         ;566
00001c  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]            ;569
00001e  8083              STRH     r3,[r0,#4]            ;570
000020  8042              STRH     r2,[r0,#2]            ;571
000022  80c2              STRH     r2,[r0,#6]            ;572
000024  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]            ;575
000026  8183              STRH     r3,[r0,#0xc]          ;576
000028  8145              STRH     r5,[r0,#0xa]
;;;578    	FormWIFI->FontBlue.Space = 0;
00002a  81c2              STRH     r2,[r0,#0xe]
;;;579    
;;;580    	FormWIFI->FontRed.FontCode = FC_ST_16;
00002c  7401              STRB     r1,[r0,#0x10]
;;;581    	FormWIFI->FontRed.BackColor = CL_BTN_FACE;
00002e  8283              STRH     r3,[r0,#0x14]
;;;582    	FormWIFI->FontRed.FrontColor = CL_RED;
000030  02eb              LSLS     r3,r5,#11
000032  8243              STRH     r3,[r0,#0x12]
;;;583    	FormWIFI->FontRed.Space = 0;
000034  82c2              STRH     r2,[r0,#0x16]
;;;584    
;;;585    	/* 按钮字体 */
;;;586    	FormWIFI->FontBtn.FontCode = FC_ST_16;
000036  7601              STRB     r1,[r0,#0x18]
;;;587    	FormWIFI->FontBtn.BackColor = CL_MASK;		/* 透明背景 */
000038  f6491199          MOV      r1,#0x9999
00003c  8381              STRH     r1,[r0,#0x1c]
;;;588    	FormWIFI->FontBtn.FrontColor = CL_BLACK;
00003e  8342              STRH     r2,[r0,#0x1a]
;;;589    	FormWIFI->FontBtn.Space = 0;
000040  83c2              STRH     r2,[r0,#0x1e]
;;;590    
;;;591    	/* 分组框 */
;;;592    	FormWIFI->Box1.Left = BOX1_X;
000042  2105              MOVS     r1,#5
000044  8541              STRH     r1,[r0,#0x2a]
;;;593    	FormWIFI->Box1.Top = BOX1_Y;
000046  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
000048  8581              STRH     r1,[r0,#0x2c]
;;;594    	FormWIFI->Box1.Height = BOX1_H;
00004a  4948              LDR      r1,|L5.364|
00004c  880b              LDRH     r3,[r1,#0]  ; g_LcdHeight
00004e  f1a30112          SUB      r1,r3,#0x12

;;;595    	FormWIFI->Box1.Width = BOX1_W;

000056  8809              LDRH     r1,[r1,#0]  ; g_LcdWidth
000058  f1a1050a          SUB      r5,r1,#0xa
00005c  8605              STRH     r5,[r0,#0x30]
;;;596    	FormWIFI->Box1.pCaption = BOX1_TEXT;
00005e  a545              ADR      r5,|L5.372|
;;;597    	FormWIFI->Box1.Font = &FormWIFI->FontBox;
000060  6385              STR      r5,[r0,#0x38]
000062  f1000520          ADD      r5,r0,#0x20
;;;598    
;;;599    	/* 静态标签 */
;;;600    	FormWIFI->Label1.Left = LABEL1_X;

00006a  87c5              STRH     r5,[r0,#0x3e]
;;;601    	FormWIFI->Label1.Top = LABEL1_Y;

;;;602    	FormWIFI->Label1.MaxLen = 0;

;;;661    }
000162  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;662

                          AREA ||i.TestWIFI||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          REQUIRE _printf_percent
                          REQUIRE _printf_s
                          REQUIRE _printf_str
                          REQUIRE _printf_str
                  TestWIFI PROC
;;;134    */
;;;135    void TestWIFI(void)
000000  e92d43f0          PUSH     {r4-r9,lr}
;;;136    {
;;;137    	uint8_t ucKeyCode;		/* 按键代码 */
;;;138    	uint8_t ucTouch;		/* 触摸事件 */
;;;139    	uint8_t fQuit = 0;
;;;140    	int16_t tpX, tpY;
;;;141    	uint8_t ucValue;
;;;142    	uint8_t fRefresh = 1;
;;;143    	FormWIFI_T form;
;;;144    
;;;145    	FormWIFI = &form;
000004  4cd8              LDR      r4,|L6.872|
000006  f6ad1df4          SUB      sp,sp,#0x9f4          ;136
00000a  a802              ADD      r0,sp,#8
;;;146    
;;;147    	LCD_ClrScr(CL_BTN_FACE);
00000c  f64e785b          MOV      r8,#0xef5b
000010  6060              STR      r0,[r4,#4]  ; FormWIFI
000012  2700              MOVS     r7,#0                 ;139
000014  2501              MOVS     r5,#1                 ;142
000016  4640              MOV      r0,r8
000018  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_ClrScr
;;;148    
;;;149    	InitFormWIFI();
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       InitFormWIFI
;;;150    	DispFormWIFI();
000020  f7fffffe          BL       DispFormWIFI
;;;151    	
;;;152    	bsp_InitESP8266();
000024  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_InitESP8266
;;;153    	
;;;154    	//WiFiDispHelp();
;;;155    		
;;;156    	DispInfoWiFi("【1】正在给ESP8266模块上电...(波特率: 74880bsp)");
000028  a0d0              ADR      r0,|L6.876|
00002a  f7fffffe          BL       DispInfoWiFi
;;;157    	printf("\r\n【1】正在给ESP8266模块上电...(波特率: 74880bsp)\r\n");
00002e  a0db              ADR      r0,|L6.924|
000030  f7fffffe          BL       __2printf
;;;158    	
;;;159    	ESP8266_PowerOn();
000034  f7fffffe          BL       ESP8266_PowerOn
;;;160    
;;;161    	DispInfoWiFi("【2】上电完成。波特率: 115200bsp");
000038  a0e5              ADR      r0,|L6.976|
00003a  f7fffffe          BL       DispInfoWiFi

;;;334    					break;
;;;335    
;;;336    				case KEY_DOWN_K2:			/* K2键按下 */
;;;337    					//ESP8266_SendAT("AT+CWJAP=\"Tenda_5BD8A8\",\"123456887af\"");	/* 加入某个WIFI 网络 */
;;;338    					//ESP8266_JoinAP("Tenda_5BD8A8", "123456887af");
;;;339    					break;
;;;340    
;;;341    				case KEY_DOWN_K3:			/* K3键-9600波特率切换到115200 */
;;;342    					comSetBaud(COM_ESP8266, 9600);			/* 模块缺省是9600bps */
000308  f44f5116          MOV      r1,#0x2580
00030c  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00030e  f7fffffe          BL       comSetBaud
;;;343    					ESP8266_SendAT("AT+CIOBAUD=115200");	/* 按 9600bps 发送指令切换为 115200 */
000312  a079              ADR      r0,|L6.1272|
000314  f7fffffe          BL       ESP8266_SendAT
;;;344    					ESP8266_WaitResponse("OK", 2000);		/* 这个 OK 是模块按 9600 应答的 */
000318  f44f69fa          MOV      r9,#0x7d0
00031c  4649              MOV      r1,r9
00031e  a044              ADR      r0,|L6.1072|
000320  f7fffffe          BL       ESP8266_WaitResponse
;;;345    					comSetBaud(COM_ESP8266, 115200);		/* 切换STM32的波特率为 115200 */
000324  f44f31e1          MOV      r1,#0x1c200
000328  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00032a  f7fffffe          BL       comSetBaud
;;;346    
;;;347    					/* 切换为 Station模式 */
;;;348    					bsp_DelayMS(100);
00032e  2064              MOVS     r0,#0x64
000330  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_DelayMS
;;;349    					ESP8266_SendAT("AT+CWMODE=1");
000334  a075              ADR      r0,|L6.1292|
000336  f7fffffe          BL       ESP8266_SendAT
;;;350    					ESP8266_WaitResponse("OK", 2000);
00033a  4649              MOV      r1,r9
00033c  a03c              ADR      r0,|L6.1072|
00033e  f7fffffe          BL       ESP8266_WaitResponse
;;;351    					bsp_DelayMS(1500);
000342  f24050dc          MOV      r0,#0x5dc
000346  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_DelayMS
;;;352    					ESP8266_SendAT("AT+RST");
00034a  a073              ADR      r0,|L6.1304|
;;;353    					break;
00034c  e001              B        |L6.850|
                  |L6.846|
00034e  e002              B        |L6.854|
                  |L6.848|
;;;354    
;;;355    				case JOY_DOWN_U:		/* 摇杆上键， AT+CIFSR获取本地IP地址 */
;;;356    					ESP8266_SendAT("AT+CIFSR");

;;;358    
;;;359    				case JOY_DOWN_D:		/* 摇杆DOWN键 AT+CIPSTATUS获得IP连接状态 */
;;;360    					ESP8266_SendAT("AT+CIPSTATUS");
;;;361    					break;
;;;362    
;;;363    				case JOY_DOWN_L:		/* 摇杆LEFT键按下   AT+CIPSTART 建立TCP连接. 访问www,armfly.com http服务端口 */

;;;365    					break;
;;;366    
;;;367    				case JOY_DOWN_R:		/* 摇杆RIGHT键按下  AT+CIPCLOSE关闭当前的TCP或UDP连接  */
;;;368    					ESP8266_SendAT("AT+CIPCLOSE");
;;;369    					break;
;;;370    
;;;371    				case JOY_DOWN_OK:		/* 摇杆OK键按下  */
;;;372    					//printf("\r\n进入固件升级模式\r\n");
;;;373    					break;
